title: 2.3 Master Challenge 3
question:
Ms. Shanon has organized a get-together for her friends at a restaurant. She wants to add a tip to the bill amount based on the number of guests. Write a program to help her decide the tip amount.
The condition is that if the number of guests is greater than or equal to 8, then the tip would amount to 25% of the total bill. Otherwise, 15% of the total bill will be added as the tip.
1. Prompt the user to input the number of guests at the party.
2. Ask the user to input the bill amount.
3. Using the if-else statements, apply the condition.
4. Calculate the total bill amount after adding the tip. (Use compound assignment operators here.)
5. Print the total bill amount, including the tip.
